info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 18 at 6:29AM CDT until August 19 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS La Crosse WI
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota...Wisconsin...
Turtle Creek Near Austin 3NW affecting Mower County.
Trempealeau River at Arcadia affecting Trempealeau and Buffalo Counties.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Trempealeau River at Arcadia.
* WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow morning.
* IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding begins. A few streets are affected by high water, and pumping operations begin.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.0 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.1 feet on 05/21/2013. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse.
The next statement will be issued this evening by 1100 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW MORNING
